import React from 'react' import './style.css' function DevItem({ dev, onDelete, openModal }) { async function handleDelete(e) { e.preventDefault() await onDelete(dev._id) } function handleEdit(e) { e.preventDefault() openModal() } return (
  • {dev.name} {dev.techs.join(', ')}

    {dev.bio}

    Acessar github
    • ) } export default DevItem
